title: Pesticide Storage | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Store chemicals properly for land and property management.
subtasks: Limit human and animal access to chemicals.
Ensure labels are read and followed for safety and usage.
Manage chemicals by category (e.g., insecticides vs. herbicides).
Keep chemicals in their original containers.
Avoid storing chemicals in food containers.
Properly store personal protective equipment separate from chemicals.

tasks.task: Watch video segments from "From the Ground Up" about chemical management for landowners.
subtasks: Identify the speaker, Hudson Hill, from the University of Wyoming Extension.
Recognize the source of the video, "From the Ground Up."
Note the discussion about storing chemicals for weed and insect management.

tasks.task: Therefore, it's all relevant, and the tasks are the steps in managing and storing agricultural chemicals. So the answer should list those tasks as MAINTASKs with their respective subtasks. Makes sense. So done.
Store chemicals properly for land and property management.**
Watch the video "From the Ground Up" about chemical management for landowners.**
